data.message: I once you's to be all about money and rap and party's and drugs and alcohol but I don't care any more and I feel great because a roof is roof with rooms and shower and stuff so have fun with your rap life and waste it I hate doing the one thing all my life I'm ova it and finding new things to do and love and money don't bother me you should do the same mate? :p

replies.message: Love you Eminem!! Saw you in N.J. Can't wait to see you again!

Eminem's Asgard Rap God - Eminem's World Order Idea

These stars are more capable of taking care of the people and making decisions for the world then our government in charge! The people are already calling them Kings and Queens and love them more then our congressmen! I just do not want them becoming Tyrants its why i attacked there character! I need them to understand that a King and Queen only have 1 Castle and the majority of there wealth is to be used to take care of there people and to construct communities and city's....These stars manage money better then the Government does...they can collect the taxes...Eminem happens to be the smartest one in there bunch! So I would make him KING AS WE MOVE TOWARDS NEW WORLD ORDER! ASGARD CITY'S OF GOLD! HAVE FAITH IN EMINEM AND IN THE STARS THEY CAN DO THIS! START ORGANIZING! I WANT THE ARMY ON OUR SIDE NOT THERE'S! TIME TO BRING DOWN CONGRESS'S TYRANNY! SPREAD THE WORD! WERE TIRED OF CONGRESSES BULLSHIT!

IM SKITTLES TASTE THE RAINBOW BITCHES
